explains: n. 粗厚起绒呢料；粗呢连帽风雪大衣；运动器材；圆筒状肩背旅行袋
wordGroup: duffel bag 背包；行李袋；筒状行李

sentences.en: This bag foreran the duffel bag for light travel to keep necessities in.
sentences.cn: 放在行李包前的包是用来放必需品的。

sentences.en: Computer bags or Small duffel bags.
Amy set the duffel bag on the chair beside the bed.
sentences.cn: 艾米的帆布袋在床旁的椅子上。
